node.title: Shards & Isolation Choir - Inside I'll Sing
node.description: London-based experimental vocal ensemble Shards teamed up with a couple of musicians and released Inside I'll Sing. their Isolation Choir consists of Douglas Dare, Joe Newman (Alt-J), Jonathan Donahue (Mercury Rev), Anna Meredith, New York-based composer Nico Muhly, Luke Howard, Hatis Noit and many more. proceeds will be donated.
node.release: Inside I'll Sing was released on Erased Tapes on April 17, 2020.
